channel.title: Need Training Area Help
channel.description:
Well i need help making a training area at varrock Small bank , in frount of it the building has Hay Bales , Dummies , Doors i need to make them all train like this
Hay Bales = Defence = 6 lvls Every Click Door = Str = 8 lvls Every click - (if u need to or its more easier 6) Dummies = attack = 7 Lvls every click - ( same as ^ if u need 2)
So if some1 can post a reply on how i do this i would be really great full.

item.title: Need Training Area Help
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Well i need help making a training area at varrock Small bank , in frount of it the building has Hay Bales , Dummies , Doors i need to make them all train like this

Hay Bales = Defence = 6 lvls Every Click
Door = Str = 8 lvls Every click - (if u need to or its more easier 6)
Dummies = attack = 7 Lvls every click - ( same as ^ if u need 2)

So if some1 can post a reply on how i do this i would be really great full.
